definitions.definition: The act, art, or practice of composing poetic verse ; the construction or measure of verse or poetry ; metrical composition.
The process by which the books of the Bible were divided into verses; a particular way of dividing biblical books into verses

main_definition: ( poetry ) The act, art, or practice of composing poetic verse ; the construction or measure of verse or poetry ; metrical composition.
secondary_definitions: ( biblical ) The process by which the books of the Bible were divided into verses; a particular way of dividing biblical books into verses
